word: I can write no more now, but I say, Give no ear to heresy. Cling to a plain "Thus saith the Lord."  He will comfort and bless you, and will give you joy in your heart. Praise the Lord that we have clear light, and a plain, distinct message to bear.--Letter 118, 1900, pp. 1, 2, 5-7. (To Sister Hall, Aug. 2, 1900.)
